error.message: Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Call to deprecated method assertInternalType() of class PHPUnit\Framework\Assert: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/3369
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to easy_breadcrumb.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
